Лучшая игра из тех где можно побывать в шкуре любимого тобой героя из других вселенных игр/фильмов. Можно хорошенько убить время и позабавиться над другими игроками и потрепать свои же нервишки. Ждём того когда игра выйдет на новый уровень и появятся много нового и полезного, а так же и новые режимы в игре. Можно было бы устроить допустим прятки на выживание или предатель среди своих напарников. Разнообразие режима в этой игре было бы очень хорошей затеей для неё.
Jogo ótimo pra se divertir com os amigos ou jogando solo também.

Leons moans make me very horny
Pyramid Head is thick af
Micheal Myers theme hits hard
What more is there to discuss?

I enjoyed this game for a while, while it may be fun and may have potential the company showed to not understand the community and is not able to listen to them.  
Every other game always balance the games based on the top players because they know that they will create a meta and other players will pick it up from them. Nobody remains a "new player" for much, so it's better to balance the game for the top, because sincerely it's easy to climb you just have to play a lot.  
Behaviour prefers to make the game more accessible as possible for new players, making dubious changes without ever considering the skill of the player in question.  
They never listen to the community and even try to silence them when they have critique, so I write this here, the only place they can't shut me up.  
  
I am sure that I will never give an extra euro to them, and I may never play this game again. Thank you for ruining the asymmetric horror genre.
Токсичная, веселая игра, хорошие пробивания у маньяков через окна))).Игра идеально подходит чтобы поиграть с друзьями и повеселится.
Horrível, só gente tóxica joga essa merda, seus lixos!

dead by daylight... игра просто потрясающая, у неё нет конкурентов, в МЕРУ токсичное коммюнити (токсиков встречал только в пабликах вк, лол), интересные и довольно частые обновления и потрясающая атмосфера. Разнообразная и довольно быстрая прокачка, за 24 часа прокачал 1 выжившего до 47 уровня и 2 убийц до 19-20. Возможно позже отредактирую отзыв, но пока что все класс.
Love Dead by Daylight forever. Pls keep going on the right way <3
Отличная игра в 30фпс,больше комп не тянет,но мне и так отлично:D
Miss being new to this game. Pretty good game so far.

Enjoyable for people looking for something unique. Dead By Daylight truly is a very addictive and well made game. The devs keep updating this bad boy with lots of new content and the usual bug fixes. You can gather your friends and head out to take on the killer or be the killer yourself and hunt down anyone foolish enough to get in your way. Keep in mind if you play killer for the first time, the chances are that you are gonna get bullied a lot. Also the salt in this game is truly something that just brings a smile upon my face after devouring a survive with your friends group. Go get them generators and sacrifices! And remember... Death is not an escape.
Definitely not one of the AFK killers.
血点消失问题一直无法解决，玩一把很累的，一点补偿也没有。本来就是小众游戏，再把老玩家赶跑了，这游戏就彻底凉了

The concept of cat and mouse, the mouse scurries to keep itself safe from danger while the cat enjoys the pleasure of chasing down the mouse for fun. While one's heart is beating for the excitement the others is beating out of fear. The cat is unable to secure a definitive victory over the mouse, who, despite not being able to defeat the cat, is able to avoid capture. In extreme cases, the idiom may imply that the contest is never-ending. In such cases either party may eventually become exhausted and give an opportunity to the opposing party to take advantage of said exhaustion resulting in either cat or mouse to achieve a result.
前期很吃技能，坚持下去，你会发现这个游戏的魅力
